Doom Emacs.heading: SlanoMacs
Doom Emacs.description: A detailed Emacs configuration based off of Doom Emacs, optimized for MacOS and Linux, with clear documentation, and unique aesthetic customizations.

SLLang.heading: SLLang
SLLang.description: SLLang is a simple language created in order to teach me more about low-level programming and other important features. It has a simple syntax, but retains a high-speed by using various features discussed in the project.

MinType.heading: MinType
MinType.description: MinType is a simple Typing Test Website created for a school project, which utilizes JS in order to create a minimal typing test website. With inspiration drawn from MonkeyType and Typings!
